code: import axios from"@helpers/axios/public.axios";import{AUTH}from"../../constants";export const createPassword=_ref=>{let{myCode:code,new_password}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.post("/change-password",{code,new_password});console.log(response);return response;}catch(e){dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_ERROR,payload:e.response.data.message});throw e;}};};
